speech: Take 5 grams of coriander seeds (Dhaniyalu), 3 grams of cumin seeds (Jeelakarra), and 5 grams of ginger, and lightly crush them. Add this mixture to a glass of boiling water and let it simmer until the liquid reduces to one-fourth of its original quantity. Strain the decoction and drink it warm to help reduce fever and chills if your symptoms getting worse please consult your doctor
